data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Najer, Tomas, Sychra, Oldrich, Hung, Nguyen Manh, Capek, Miroslav, Podzemny, Petr, Literak, Ivan (2012): New species and new records of chewing lice (Phthiraptera: Amblycera and Ischnocera) from bulbuls (Passeriformes: Pycnonotidae) in Vietnam. Zootaxa 3357: 37-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214734
